channel.title: Changing players Spawn [317]
channel.description: How can i change new players spawn when they log in and when they die. My ::home is in Varrock and people logs in at Lumby How can i change that? and When you die you spawn some where in Fally can i change that to if so How can i change these?

item.title: Changing players Spawn [317]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Should be something like this in config.java

public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 2601; // start here public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 3092;

Just change it to varrock coords.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing players Spawn [317]
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:

OFF THE TOP OF MY HEAD:
When you log in, find the x and y of where you are, search for that in your source, change all the things you find to your x and y in varrock.
EXAMPLE:
you log in at 2522, 2525
you want it to be, 3622, 3623
search for 2522, 2525
replace with 3622,3623

@deathscape1993
Fuck you and your Rep -. Iâ€™m being nice and helping, i tried to help this person, and you rep - me for being wrong? unless you have a better awnser then this, fuck off you little twat.

Read full topic
